extension.summary: Under This Repo, I Will Host Addons With No Home,Bring Life To Dead Addons That Are Fully Work, Link To Repos From Devs (This will install current version the Dev Has)
extension.description: ADDONS UNDER THIS SCRAPE THE NET, NO CONTENT IS HOSTED/DISTRIBUTED HERE, CONTACT WEBSITES IF WANT REMOVED [CR] Wanna Help With Server Cost Donate www.paypal.me/BrianSMASH [CR] [B]Smash Repo Change Log 1.3.0[/B] [CR] Added Some New Addons Time For Change People [CR] check for updates before going into vid addons
extension.news: IF YOU DO WANNA HELP YOU CAN FOLLOW ME ON TWITTER @XSMASHX88X AND SUB TO MY CHANNEL WWW.YOUTUBE.COM/XSMASHX88X
